sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './SummaryViewer.css'; import { TBookSummary } from '../../data.controller/data.types'; type TProps = { data: TBookSummary, onCopy: (evt: any, summary: string)=>void, } const SummaryViewer: React.FC = ({data, onCopy}) => { const summary = ` Book Summary (${(data.summaryDurationSec).toFixed(2)}sec) BookID: ${data.id} - ${data.idType} Created at: ${data._createdAt} Book Contains '${data.wordsCount}' words in total of which '${data.uniqueWordsCount}' are unique Most Frequent word is '${data.mostFrequentWord.key}' with frequency '${data.mostFrequentWord.frequency}' and length '${data.mostFrequentWord.length}' Least Frequent word is '${data.leastFrequentWord.key}' with frequency '${data.leastFrequentWord.frequency}' and length '${data.leastFrequentWord.length}' Longest word is '${data.longestWord.key}' with frequency '${data.longestWord.frequency}' and length '${data.longestWord.length}' Shortest word is '${data.shortestWord.key}' with frequency '${data.shortestWord.frequency}' and length '${data.shortestWord.length}' `; return (
onCopy && onCopy(evt, summary)}>

Meta Data

ID

{`${data.id.substr(0, 20)}... - ${data.idType}`}

Info

{`${data.meta}${data.idType === 'book-hash' ? '...' : ''}`}

Timestamp

{data._createdAt}

Duration

{(data.summaryDurationSec).toFixed(2)}sec

Summary

Words Count

{data.wordsCount}

Unique Words

{data.uniqueWordsCount}

{`Most Frequent word is '${data.mostFrequentWord.key}' with frequency '${data.mostFrequentWord.frequency}' and length '${data.mostFrequentWord.length}'`}

Token

Frequency

Length

{data.mostFrequentWord.key}

{data.mostFrequentWord.frequency}

{data.mostFrequentWord.length}

{`Least Frequent word is '${data.leastFrequentWord.key}' with frequency '${data.leastFrequentWord.frequency}' and length '${data.leastFrequentWord.length}'`}

Token

Frequency

Length

{data.leastFrequentWord.key}

{data.leastFrequentWord.frequency}

{data.leastFrequentWord.length}

{`Longest word is '${data.longestWord.key}' with frequency '${data.longestWord.frequency}' and length '${data.longestWord.length}'`}

Token

Frequency

Length

{data.longestWord.key}

{data.longestWord.frequency}

{data.longestWord.length}

{`Shortest word is '${data.shortestWord.key}' with frequency '${data.shortestWord.frequency}' and length '${data.shortestWord.length}'`}

Token

Frequency

Length

{data.shortestWord.key}

{data.shortestWord.frequency}

{data.shortestWord.length}

); } export default SummaryViewer;
